Biography

UNA 2024: Appeared in 21 games with 19 starts ... Batted .226 in 62 at bats with a .290 on base percentage ... Knocked in eight RBI's and recorded 14 hits with eight walks ... Hit two home runs and three doubles.

UNA 2023: Appeared in 12 games, starting in five ... Hit .087 in 23 at bats with a .276 on base percentage ... Knocked in three RBI's and notched two hits with six walks ... Hit a double against Murray State on April 25, 2023.

UNA 2022: Appeared in 27 games, starting in 22 ... Hit .208 (15-72) with a .341 on base percentage ... Hit .353 (6-17) against left-handed pitchers ... Had two multi-hit games on the season, and carried a nine-game streak of reaching base safely into the 2023 season.

COLLEGE: Transferred to UNA from Cleveland State Community College ... As a freshman (2019-20) he appeared in seven games ... Drove in five runs and scored four ... Made his collegiate debut vs. Southwest Virginia (Feb. 1), where he was two-for-three with a home run, three RBI, and two runs scored ... Originally attended Walters State Community College.

HIGH SCHOOL: Played third base and in the outfield at West High School ... A 2017 all-state selection, all-region in 2017 and 2018 and all-district in 2018 ... Also lettered in football.

PERSONAL: Full name is John Callaway Cook, Jr. ... Son of John and Cathy Cook and has two sisters ... Majoring in Accounting ... BATS RIGHT, THROWS RIGHT.
